name: Hearts ◆
description:
Come play the best HEARTS on the app store! It's completely FREE! If you love hearts, we know you'll love this awesome version by Banana & Co.

- The very best & most polished version of Hearts on iOS.
- Beautiful HD retina graphics featuring stunning themes.
- From classic to minimal to modern, there is a theme style to suit everyone!
- The ONLY card games with awesome ambient background animations.
- Endless combination of settings to make the game truly yours. Set it your way and play!
- Rules settings including Jack of Diamonds and Queen of Spades.
- Three difficulties for players of all skill levels.
- Sleek, modern, and easy to play!
- Universal app works on iPhone and iPad.
- Hints, history, help, and more!
- Free to play with loads of free content updates.

Give it a try today - and as always, thanks for playing!
